sentences.sentence: Billy started to snivel. His mother smacked his hand.
sentences.translation: 比利抽抽搭搭地哭了起来。他妈妈狠狠地打了他的手一下。

sentences.sentence: Tears and snivel fall down at the same time.
sentences.translation: 成语解释： 鼻涕眼泪同时流下，形容极度哀痛。 同“涕泪交零”。

sentences.sentence: Put your handkerchief away — don't snivel before me.
sentences.translation: 把手绢收起来——别在我跟前一把鼻涕一把泪的。
